question.question: Which of the following is a primary indication for locoregional anaesthesia?
question.option_a: Treatment of chronic pain in non-surgical patients
question.option_b: Reduction of blood loss during major surgeries
question.option_c: Prevention of postoperative nausea and vomiting
question.option_d: Minimizing the risk of general anaesthesia in high-risk patients
